title: Passwordless Login
description: Log in without entering a password.
help: Passwordless login will send you an email with a magic link that will log you into WordPress with a click of a button.

group.title: Enable Passwordless Login
group.description: Send an email with a secure link that allows users to login without entering a password.

2fa_bypass_group.title: Allow Two-Factor Bypass for Passwordless Login
2fa_bypass_group.description: Add an option to bypass two-factor authentication when using passwordless login in the WordPress user profile.

methods.title: Available Authentication Methods
methods.description: iThemes Security supports multiple Passwordless Login methods.

availability.title: Per-User Availability
availability.description: By default, all users selected above will be able to use Passwordless Login. Change to “Disabled” if you prefer to have users opt-in on their individual profiles.

oneOf.title: Method First
oneOf.description: Choose between the traditional and Passwordless Login methods before entering a username or email address.

oneOf.title: Username First
oneOf.description: Enter the username or email address first before selecting the login method.

ui:enumDescriptions: Email users a Magic Link they can use to login with one click.
Users can login with biometrics like Face ID, Touch ID, Windows Hello or any passkey their device supports.
